channel.title: CVE Feed for Xorg -- libXdmcp
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Xorg -- libXdmcp

item.title: CVE-2017-2625|2024-08-05T14:02:06.921Z -- xorg -- libxdmcp
item.description: It was discovered that libXdmcp before 1.1.2 including used weak entropy to generate session keys. On a multi-user system using xdmcp, a local attacker could potentially use information available from the process list to brute force the key, allowing them to hijack other users' sessions.
